about_the_game:
If you enjoyed Touhou Crisis, consider showing your support by picking up some bonus content!

Note: To access the DLC content, navigate to the game's install location and open the "Artbook & Soundtrack" Folder

What's Included

  • Concept Art: Take a look at our artist's work-in-progress sketches before we sent them back for revision!
  • Character Sprites: Take a look at our artist's final drawings after they were sent back for revision!
  • Soundtrack: Jam out to all 5 music tracks used in-game plus some bonus work-in-progress versions of said tracks!
  • Work-in-Progress Screenshots: Check out some progress pics that we developers spammed on Discord while we were supposed to be working! Organized chronologically to better witness how the game evolved to where it is now.

short_description: If you enjoyed Touhou Crisis, consider showing your support by picking up some bonus content! Includes pretty pictures, memorable music and some from the creators!
